message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be highly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start.  What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. However, $11,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind. Could you do $13,000? That would make this a worthwhile deal for both of us.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can we meet in the middle at $12,500?
